TypeSignature.Value: public class ContractBase : MarshalByRefObject, System.AddIn.Contract.IContract, System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractBase extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor

Docs.summary: Provides a default implementation of members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Contracts define the types and methods used by the host and the add-in. All contracts must derive from <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>. This class provides the default implementation of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 AcquireLifetimeToken() cil managed

Docs.returns: A random number that identifies a token.
Docs.exception: All previously acquired tokens have been revoked. No further tokens are available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetRemoteHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the hash code for the current object.
Docs.returns: A hash code for the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFinalRevoke() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in an add-in-side adapter, releases native resources held by the adapter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called by the system when all the lifetime tokens that have been acquired from the current <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase> instance have been revoked. Use this method to clean up any native resources held by the adapter, and to signal to the adapted views that they should do the same.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract QueryContract(string contractIdentifier) cil managed

Docs.param: The full name of the contract, including its assembly name.
Docs.summary: Reflects over the instance of a contract and returns the pointer if the current object implements that contract.
Docs.returns: The pointer to an interface, or if the contract is not implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method can be overridden.

Docs.param: The object to test for equality with the remote object.
Docs.summary: Compares an object with a remote object for equality.
Docs.returns: if the object is equal to the remote object; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string RemoteToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a string that identifies a remote object.
Docs.returns: A string that identifies the remote object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TimeSpan Renewal(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease lease) cil managed

Docs.param: The lifetime lease object that is used by the remoting lifetime service.
Docs.summary: Requests a sponsoring client to renew the lease for the specified object.
Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RevokeLifetimeToken(int32 token) cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the specified token from the list of outstanding lifetime tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the token is not in the list of outstanding lifetime tokens, this method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

Docs.exception: is not found in the list of outstanding lifetime tokens.
